meanings.definition: A small four-sided spinning top, typically used in a game of chance during the Jewish holiday of Hanukkah.
meanings.sent1: During Hanukkah, children enjoy playing with the dreidl.
meanings.sent2: The dreidl spun quickly on the floor, bringing joy to the players.
meanings.sent3: The dreidl decided the fate of the game with its spins.
meanings.sent4: As the dreidl twirled, it seemed to hold the secrets of luck.
meanings.sent5: The colorful dreidl sparkled under the holiday lights.
